Class Code

java.lang.Object
io.mindspice.simplypages.core.HtmlTag
io.mindspice.simplypages.components.Code
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component
public class Code extends HtmlTag
Code component for displaying code snippets.

Supports both inline code and code blocks with optional syntax highlighting classes.

Usage Examples

// Inline code
Code.inline("System.out.println()");

// Code block
Code.block("public static void main(String[] args) {\n    // code here\n}");

// Code block with language
Code.block(codeString).withLanguage("java");

// Code block with title
Code.block(codeString)
    .withLanguage("python")
    .withTitle("Example.py");

      public Code withLanguage(String language)
      Sets the programming language for syntax highlighting. This adds a language-specific class for syntax highlighters.
      Parameters:
      language - the language name (e.g., "java", "python", "javascript")

    • render

      public String render()
      Description copied from interface: Component
      Renders this component to an HTML string with an empty context.

      This is a convenience method that delegates to Component.render(RenderContext) with RenderContext.empty().

      HTML string representation of this component
